actions.name: Blanketing Firn
actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat or when the user gains this Ability.

Effect: The Weather is changed to Intense Snowfall. This weather persists while the user with this Ability is active. When the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or switches out, the weather will change to Snowy for 5 rounds.
